resources.string: Don\'t worry! It occurs. Please enter the email address linked with your account.
Enter the verification code we just sent on your email address.
Your new password must be unique from those previously used.
Your password has been changed successfully.
Please, Fill your personal information so that we can handle your submit.
Here you can see the result of your commercial register request.\n\nClick on each request to see more details.

Terms and Conditions:

Welcome to our application for business registration. By using this application, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following terms and conditions. Please read these terms carefully before using the application.

Acceptance of Terms:
By using the application, you agree to be bound by these terms, which establish a contractual relationship between you and the application.

User Responsibilities:
Users are responsible for providing accurate and complete information in the business registration application. Any false information may lead to the rejection of the application.

Privacy Policy:
The application respects and protects the privacy of its users. Personal information provided during the registration process will be handled in accordance with our Privacy Policy.

Application Usage:
The application is designed to assist users in the process of submitting and tracking business registration requests. Any misuse or unauthorized access to the application is strictly prohibited.

Notification Preferences:
Users agree to receive notifications regarding the status of their registration requests. These notifications will be sent to the provided email address and mobile number.

Support and Assistance:
Users can contact customer support for assistance. The support team will provide help and guidance related to the application and registration process.

Intellectual Property:
The application and its content are protected by intellectual property laws. Users agree not to reproduce, distribute, modify, or create derivative works based on the application without explicit permission.

Termination:
The application reserves the right to terminate or suspend user accounts for any violation of these terms and conditions.

Updates and Changes:
The application may update or change these terms and conditions from time to time. Users will be notified of any significant changes.

Governing Law:
These terms and conditions are governed by the laws of [insert applicable jurisdiction].

By using the application, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these terms and conditions.

Introduction:
This guide provides an overview of the key features of the business registration application. Please follow these steps to navigate through the application effectively.

1. Submission of Request:

Users fill in required information for business registration.
The application guides users through the data entry process, ensuring accurate completion of mandatory fields.
2. Real-Time Tracking:

After submission, users can track the status of their request in real time.
A clear and intuitive dashboard displays various stages of the process, with notifications updating users on request progress.
3. Assistance and Resources:

Access built-in assistance features, including FAQs, form-filling tips, and resources on business registration requirements.
4. Customer Support:

Users can directly contact customer support for personalized assistance via in-app messaging or calls.
Application Execution Example:

Download and install the app.
Log in or create an account.
Choose from options like "Submit Request," "Track Request," "Resources," and "Customer Support."
Follow prompts to submit a new business registration request.
Review and confirm submission.
Receive confirmation and a unique tracking number.
Track progress and receive important notifications.
Contact customer support if needed.
Upon approval, receive a notification that the business registration is ready for retrieval.
